data.text: @clare_pinches @_BTO @HumphreyCrick @_AndyClements Thanks - I'm feeling fine fortunately. (And the rest of the family had it before Christmas so they are all fine). Yes hopefully another time :)
@_Firebirding @_BTO @HumphreyCrick @_AndyClements Thanks Ben. I'm fine fortunately. Hope you're well!
@KateRisely @_BTO @HumphreyCrick @_AndyClements Bad luck Kate. I hope you get well soon x

@KateRisely @_BTO @HumphreyCrick @_AndyClements Very sorry to hear that Kate. I noticed your name was on the list but had clocked you didn’t seem to be there today. Hope you’re not feeling poorly and look forward to meeting you in person another time.
@_AndyClements @_BTO @HumphreyCrick Thanks - such bad timing! The talks looked really interesting
@KateRisely @_BTO @HumphreyCrick Very sorry to hear that and to miss you today - recover soon Kate
@CatMorrison18 @_BTO @HumphreyCrick @_AndyClements One skill obtained after two years working from home!
@KateRisely @_BTO @HumphreyCrick @_AndyClements That coffee looks super pro for a home made one! Hope you feel better soon!
